About Me

A Software Engineer based in the USA

I design and develop websites and applications using a variety of programming languages, libraries, and frameworks, with experience in both front- and backend development. My passion is to create beautiful applications that are highly intuitive and efficient in their function.

I have an eclectic background, I've been a professional ballerina, model, teacher and tutor, researcher, acupuncturist and naturopathic physician. Each of these previous areas of work and study bring something unique to my coding, from a love of beauty and aesthetic to a desire for clarity and enlightenment to an ability to look at a problem and find a simple and efficient solution.

United States

Las Vegas, Nevada
